articles.title: White House says $100K H-1B visa fee won’t apply to existing holders as Trump move stirs anxiety
articles.description:
“Those who already hold H-1B visas and are currently outside of the country right now will NOT be charged $100,000 to re-enter," White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said in a posting on X.

The post White House says $100K H-1B visa fee won’t apply to existing holders as Trump move stirs anxiety appeared first on Boston.com.
